DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine feasibility monitor cancer patient use wrist-worn activity monitor movement tracker . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate association activity patient report fatigue . II . To evaluate association movement incident health care intervention ( hospitalization , physical visit , intravenous hydration , etc . ) TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To compare physician patient assess Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Karnofsky performance status score data obtain movement tracker . OUTLINE : Patients perform 2 physical activity exam room record use Microsoft Kinect 2 stationary movement track device day 1 21 . The first activity rise chair , walk 10 foot , return chair . The second activity move chair step-up examination table . Patients also wear movement track wristband , Microsoft Band 2 , around wrist , complete smartphone application base patient report outcome ( PRO ) questionnaire , weigh daily 60 day . After completion study , patient follow 90 day .
